verses.verse: Paul called <WG2822> to be an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> through <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God, <WG2316> and Sosthenes <WG4988> our brother, <WG80>

To the church <WG1577> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is at <WG1722> Corinth, <WG2882> to them that are sanctified <WG37> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> called <WG2822> to be saints, <WG40> with all <WG3956> that in every <WG3956> place <WG5117> call <WG1941> on the name <WG3686> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our Lord, <WG2962> both <WG5037> their's and our's: <WG2257>
Grace <WG5485> be to you, and peace, <WG1515> from God <WG2316> our Father, <WG3962> and from the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

I thank <WG2168> my God <WG2316> always <WG3842> on <WG4012> your <WG5216> behalf, <WG4012> for the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> you by Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547>
That in every <WG3956> thing you are enriched <WG4148> by him, in all <WG3956> utterance, <WG3056> and in all <WG3956> knowledge; <WG1108>
Even <WG2531> as the testimony <WG3142> of Christ <WG5547> was confirmed <WG950> in you:
So <WG5620> that you come <WG5302> behind <WG5302> in no <WG3367> gift; <WG5486> waiting <WG553> for the coming <WG602> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>
Who <WG3739> shall also <WG2532> confirm <WG950> you to the end, <WG5056> that you may be blameless <WG410> in the day <WG2250> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
God <WG2316> is faithful, <WG4103> by whom <WG3739> you were called <WG2564> to the fellowship <WG2842> of his Son <WG5207> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our Lord. <WG2962>

Now <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you, brothers, <WG80> by the name <WG3686> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> that you all <WG3956> speak <WG3004> the same <WG846> thing, and that there be no <WG3361> divisions <WG4978> among <WG1722> you; but that you be perfectly <WG2675> joined <WG2675> together <WG2675> in the same <WG846> mind <WG3563> and in the same <WG846> judgment. <WG1106>
For it has been declared <WG1213> to me of you, my brothers, <WG80> by them which are of the house of Chloe, <WG5514> that there are contentions <WG2054> among <WG1722> you.
Now <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say, <WG3004> that every <WG1538> one of you said, <WG3004> I am <WG1510> of Paul; and I of Apollos; <WG625> and I of Cephas; <WG2786> and I of Christ. <WG5547>
Is Christ <WG5547> divided? <WG3307> was Paul crucified <WG4717> for you? or <WG2228> were you baptized <WG907> in the name <WG3686> of Paul?
I thank <WG2168> God <WG2316> that I baptized <WG907> none <WG3762> of you, but Crispus <WG2921> and Gaius; <WG1050>
Lest <WG2443> <WG3361> any <WG3387> should say <WG2036> that I had baptized <WG907> in my <WG1699> own name. <WG3686>
And I baptized <WG907> also <WG2532> the household <WG3624> of Stephanas: <WG4734> besides, <WG3063> I know <WG1492> not whether <WG1487> I baptized <WG907> any <WG1536> other. <WG243>

For Christ <WG5547> sent <WG649> me not to baptize, <WG907> but to preach <WG2097> the gospel: <WG2097> not with wisdom <WG4678> of words, <WG3056> lest <WG2443> <WG3361> the cross <WG4716> of Christ <WG5547> should be made <WG2758> of none <WG2758> effect. <WG2758>
For the preaching <WG3056> of the cross <WG4716> is to them that perish <WG622> foolishness; <WG3472> but to us which are saved <WG4982> it is the power <WG1411> of God. <WG2316>
For it is written, <WG1125> I will destroy <WG622> the wisdom <WG4678> of the wise, <WG4680> and will bring <WG114> to nothing <WG114> the understanding <WG4907> of the prudent. <WG4908>

Where <WG4226> is the wise? <WG4680> where <WG4226> is the scribe? <WG1122> where <WG4226> is the disputer <WG4804> of this <WG5127> world? <WG165> has not God <WG2316> made <WG3471> foolish <WG3471> the wisdom <WG4678> of this <WG5127> world? <WG2889>

For after <WG1894> that in the wisdom <WG4678> of God <WG2316> the world <WG2889> by wisdom <WG4678> knew <WG1097> not God, <WG2316> it pleased <WG2106> God <WG2316> by the foolishness <WG3472> of preaching <WG2782> to save <WG4982> them that believe. <WG4100>
For the Jews <WG2453> require <WG154> a sign, <WG4592> and the Greeks <WG1672> seek <WG2212> after wisdom: <WG4678>
But we preach <WG2784> Christ <WG5547> crucified, <WG4717> to the Jews <WG2453> a stumbling block, <WG4625> and to the Greeks <WG1672> foolishness; <WG3472>
But to them which <WG3588> are called, <WG2822> both <WG5037> Jews <WG2453> and Greeks, <WG1672> Christ <WG5547> the power <WG1411> of God, <WG2316> and the wisdom <WG4678> of God. <WG2316>
Because <WG3754> the foolishness <WG3474> of God <WG2316> is wiser <WG4680> than men; <WG444> and the weakness <WG772> of God <WG2316> is stronger <WG2478> than men. <WG444>

For you see <WG991> your <WG5216> calling, <WG2821> brothers, <WG80> how that not many <WG4183> wise <WG4680> men after <WG2596> the flesh, <WG4561> not many <WG4183> mighty, <WG1415> not many <WG4183> noble, <WG2104> are called:

But God <WG2316> has chosen <WG1586> the foolish <WG3474> things of the world <WG2889> to confound <WG2617> the wise; <WG4680> and God <WG2316> has chosen <WG1586> the weak <WG772> things of the world <WG2889> to confound <WG2617> the things which are mighty; <WG2478>

And base <WG36> things of the world, <WG2889> and things which are despised, <WG1848> has God <WG2316> chosen, <WG1586> yes, and things which <WG3588> are not, to bring <WG2673> to nothing <WG2673> things that are:
That no <WG3361> <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> should glory <WG2744> in his presence. <WG1799>

But of him are you in Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> who <WG3739> of God <WG2316> is made <WG1096> to us wisdom, <WG4678> and righteousness, <WG1343> and sanctification, <WG38> and redemption: <WG629>
That, according <WG2531> as it is written, <WG1125> He that glories, <WG2744> let him glory <WG2744> in the Lord. <WG2962>
